member.name: MANIPULATION_TRANSFORM
member.summary: Defines the transformation data for a manipulation.

member.name: MANIPULATION_TRANSFORM.translationX
member.summary: Translation along the x-axis, in HIMETRIC units.

member.name: MANIPULATION_TRANSFORM.translationY
member.summary: Translation along the y-axis, in HIMETRIC units.

member.name: MANIPULATION_TRANSFORM.scale
member.summary: Change in scale as a percentage, in HIMETRIC units.

member.name: MANIPULATION_TRANSFORM.expansion
member.summary: Expansion in user-defined coordinates, in HIMETRIC units.
